description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to undergraduate Physical Education/Health students within the College of Education & Professional Studies. Eligibility Requirements Full-time undergraduate student Minimum 3.0 GPA Major in Physical Education/Health Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
